metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0995 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory write flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s watch_queue event notification subsystem. This flaw can overwrite parts of the kernel state, potentially allowing a local user to gain privileged access or cause a denial of service on the system.

notes.Note: sbeattie> multiple individual commits from the merged branch
